card_name: Chrom, Descendant of the First King
type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike
[i][i]Heroic[/i] Lineage[/i] – Whenever you cast a historic spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]
[i]Savior of Ylisse[/i] – When Chrom, Descendant of the First King leaves the battlefield, you may return a permanent card that was put into your graveyard this turn from the battlefield onto the battlefield tapped.
